channel.title: Posts on Website: Ingo Lange
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Website: Ingo Lange

item.title: Create your website using RStudio and blogdown
item.description: 1 Create your own website 2 Create the project 3 Creating the GitHub Repository 4 Build the website and deploy it 5 Change the landing page 6 Standart workflow to write new content 1 Create your own website Website are a fantastic way to represent yourself and your work. Especially in the field of data science they are a great way to present your portfolio and a great addition to GitHub repositories.
